statement.p: A triangular parcel of land has sides of lengths \displaystyle{810}. feet, \displaystyle{270}. feet and \displaystyle{713} feet. Notice all three of these measurements are precise to the ones digit.

ol.li:
What is the area of the parcel of land? Round your answer to appropriate significant digits.
Area = Preview Question 1 Part 1 of 2 \displaystyle\text{ft}^{{2}}

If land is valued at 2300 per acre (1 acre is 43,560 \displaystyle\text{ft}^{{2}} ), what is the value of the parcel of land? Base on rounded area. Round your value to the nearest dollar.
value = Preview Question 1 Part 2 of 2
